text: Nitish Kumar (born 1 March 1951) is an Indian politician. He was the chief minister of Bihar from 2015 until 2022. He is the President of Janata Dal (United). He is best known for constantly switching sides between alliances, earning the name 'Paltu Ram' (turncoat). == References == == Other websites == Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Bihari politicians
title: Nitish Kumar
